alert.note: Alert for Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 27 at 6:30PM EDT until May 27 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHWESTERN WAKE COUNTY... At 630 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 3.5 inches of rain have fallen. While the thunderstorms have moved out of the area, continued run-off from flash flooding and area swollen streams is likely still ongoing. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Raleigh, Cary, Garner, Fuquay-Varina, Apex, Holly Springs, Lake Wheeler, Lake Benson, New Hill, Harris Lake Boat Launch and Shearon Harris Reservoir. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
